key.name: columns
key.description: This value needs to be greater than 3 to be effective.

key.name: rows
key.description: This value needs to be greater than 1 to be effective.

key.name: use-category
key.summary: Show the category view by default
key.description: Save the current view of the launcher.

key.name: screen-resolution
key.summary: The last resolution of the screen
key.description: This value makes slingshot able to adapt to each screen.

key.name: web-search-engine-id
key.summary: String ID of the web search engine used by the Applications menu. Enter "custom" to utilize web-search-custom-url.

key.name: web-search-custom-url
key.summary: Custom search URL with the string {query} placed where the search terms should be inserted.

key.name: web-search-enabled
key.summary: Whether or not to enable Applications menu's web search.
